name: Unnamed 2D Sandbox survival prototype
description:
This project was intended to be a fully completed game, but due to many reasons it couldn't be completed therefore is a practice/prototype.

There are only 2 kinds of enemies in this game and they are both overpowered, so try to engage them with the best weapons you can possibly get.

Good Luck!

The game is not receiving any updates as far as the developer considers, but the developer may release better projects in the future so stay tuned.
